## **Synopsis**{.unlisted}

In part 2 of this workshop series, participants will use raw gene count data generated in part 1 to perform downstream analysis of RNA-seq data using R/Rstudio - including how to analyse **raw count data to obtain differentially expressed genes and pathways**. This will be run on **[Pawsey's Nimbus Cloud](https://support.pawsey.org.au/documentation/display/US/Cloud+Documentation)** platform.

## **Pre-requisites** {.unlisted}

- Introduction to **[Unix/Linux command line](https://datacarpentry.org/shell-genomics/)** 
- Introduction to **[R/RStudio](https://datacarpentry.org/genomics-r-intro/)**
- Part 1 of the **[RNA-seq training series](https://sydney-informatics-hub.github.io/training.RNAseq.series/)**
